status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Looks like this happened as part of DERBY-5317. I will change Request.java to use import org.apache.derby.shared.common.error.ExceptionUtil; instead.
We tend to hit these from time to time. I wonder if it would be feasible for one of the nightly runs to put derbyclient.jar first.
